ygData.subject: Re: How in the world do you stack? I don't think stacking works at all . . .
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can also watch for the annoying dancing lights that appear around yourself and your party members.  They are synchronized with the blue text and song
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 21 May 1999, Rogers Pessin wrote:

> Its really very simple to keep 2 songs stacked, and not too hard to
> get 3 going. Just watch for the line in your text box that tells you
> the song effect just happened to scroll by. In full screen mode that
> line of text is in blue, and fairly easy to spot amidts all the other
> clutter scrolling by. Don't try and time it using the icons up in

You can also watch for the annoying dancing lights that appear
around yourself and your party members. They are synchronized
with the blue text and song taking effect.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
